      • getSizeLimit

        public int getSizeLimit(SMTPSession session)
        Returns the size limit of emails in bytes. Use -1 for unlimited.
        Parameters:
        session - The SMTPSession of the client the size limit will apply to.
        Returns:
        the size limit of emails in bytes. Use -1 for unlimited.

      • isVRFYallowed

        public boolean isVRFYallowed(SMTPSession session)
        Returns whether VRFY commands are supported for the given session.
        Parameters:
        session - The SMTPSession of the client this permission will apply to.
        Returns:
        whether VRFY commands are supported for the given session.

      • onMailComposed

        public abstract boolean onMailComposed(SMTPSession session,
                                       SMTPMail mail)
        Delivers the composed mail.
        Parameters:
        session - The SMTPSession of the composer.
        mail - The email that has been composed.
        Returns:
        True if delivery was successful.
